summary: This document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TruView report and a series of sales invoices from the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) commissary account for inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It shows a money transfer to Epstein and detailed commissary purchases made on his account under the name 'RUGARD, RUBEN', revealing his spending while in custody prior to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary inmate whose account is being documented; a money transfer of $200 was sent to him via Western Union on July 8, 2019, and commissary purchases were charged to his inmate account (number 76318-054 / 76220-054).

persons.name: Ruben Rugard
persons.context: Name listed on the MCC commissary sales invoices as the account holder for the purchases; appears to be an alias or the name under which Jeffrey Epstein's commissary account was operated.

connections.description: Financial records indicate commissary purchases for inmate Jeffrey Epstein were processed under the name 'RUGARD, RUBEN', suggesting this name was used for his inmate account.

events.title: Money Transfer to Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A $200.00 transfer was sent to inmate Jeffrey Epstein via Western Union.

events.title: Commissary Purchases for Inmate
events.description: A series of commissary purchases (food, toiletries, electronics) were made and charged to the inmate account associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received a $200 money transfer via Western Union on July 8, 2019, while in federal custody.
Commissary purchases for an inmate were documented under the name 'RUGARD, RUBEN' but charged to inmate account numbers associated with Jeffrey Epstein (76318-054 and 76220-054).
The purchases, spanning from July to August 2019, included a wide variety of items such as food, beverages, toiletries, a radio, a book light, and playing cards.
The document provides a detailed financial snapshot of Epstein's life and spending in the New York MCC in the weeks leading up to his death in August 2019.
The address '130 EAST 75TH NEW STREET YORK, NY 10021' is listed in connection with the name 'RUGARD, RUBEN'.
